name: boncos
description: A sophisticated bill-splitting and expense calculator built with Nuxt 4.

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags
